SYN_015_4_5: rigid bronch case for mr [REDACTED]... had a big polyp blocking the bi... we tried the snare but it wouldnt grab so we used the laser... then used the rigid scope to core it out like an apple... pulled the whole thing out with suction... cleaned up with apc... opened it up pretty good... patient didn't want a stent so we left it as is... check xray.
